Recipes.Name: Gill Serum
Recipes.Flavor: A shimmering, iridescent liquid that gives temporary gills to whomever rubs it on their skin.

Recipes.Name: Warm Healing Tonic
Recipes.Flavor: A spicy herbal drink said to warm hearts and bolster immunity.

Recipes.Name: Shake Light
Recipes.Flavor: A tiny vial that glows brightly when the liquid inside is agitated.

Recipes.Name: Sweet Healing Tonic
Recipes.Flavor: A fruity, herb-infused drink with potent healing properties.

Recipes.Name: Power Lemonade
Recipes.Flavor: A sour effervescent cocktail that brightens up any day!

Recipes.Name: Explosive Tincture
Recipes.Flavor: The will-o-wisp and wraith pepper in this potion react upon being smashed against a surface to create a sizable blast.

Recipes.Name: Wound Salve
Recipes.Flavor: A slimy green poultice that heals most wounds it's applied over.

Recipes.Name: Spiced Siren Cider
Recipes.Flavor: Warming and flavorful, this cider is the perfect thing for a cold night... or a cold. The gill serum inside not only adds a colorful shine, but has decongestion effects.

Recipes.Name: Dragons Broth
Recipes.Flavor: A hearty stew of spices and root vegetables that can fill even the hungriest stomachs.

Recipes.Name: Robot Ramen
Recipes.Flavor: Copper wires cooked al dente, soaking in a murky engine oil broth. I like the swirly things on top.

Recipes.Name: Rust-Away Salve
Recipes.Flavor: An ointment that turns back the clock on any metal surface.
